Jargon Term: Please continue to take the antibiotic, Ciprofloxacin, until you run out of them (3 weeks).
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: If you are unable to tolerate Cipro due to nausea/vomiting, or prolonged diarrhea, please call [**Telephone/Fax (1) 2756**] and page the urology resident on-call. We can consider an alternative antibiotic.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: Please follow up with your Primary Care Physician (PCP) and Dr. [**Last Name (STitle) **] (Urologist) for follow-up as intructed below. .
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - Upcoming Schedules - PCP appointment
